amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the city of Weirton, West Virginia, for planning and design, construction, renovation, and build out of facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used by the city of Weirton, West Virginia, for planning and design, construction, renovation, and build out of facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 73 - 353, 1 Present (Roll no. 278).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 73 - 353, 1 Present (Roll no. 278).
